level.heading: Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act.
level.text: The provisions of this part governing the legal effect, validity, or enforceability of electronic records or signatures, and of contracts formed or performed with the use of such records or signatures conform to the requirements of section 102 of the Electronic Signatures in Global and National Commerce Act, approved June 30, 2000 (114 Stat. 467; 5 U.S.C. § 7002) ("Act"), and supersede, modify, and limit the Act.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-107
level.text: For D.C. Law 14-107, see notes following § 47-2887.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 19 of the Uniform Athlete Agents Act.
